1649270.name: The Wind: A Story of Surrender
1649270.description:
The Wind: A Story of Surrender is a short side-scrolling platformer about a little bird who lost the ability to fly. It was made as an allegorical testimony of the situations a young woman experienced over six of her maturing years. With about 40 minutes to an hour filled with parkour and puzzles, this cute little story aims to teach an important lesson to people who struggle to overcome emotional trauma.

Features:

  • A simple story inspired by real life
  • A faith-based message
  • Fully voiced dialogue
  • Increasingly challenging parkour
  • Varied gameplay mechanics
  • Puzzles to solve
1649270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
